editorialNotes.standard: It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovioâs blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheenâand with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether itâs your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, youâll be flying high in no time.

editorialNotes.standard: Itâs hard to understate Clash of Clansâ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobileâwe still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.

editorialNotes.standard: Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercellâs awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package thatâs easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, thereâs no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

ios.subtitle: Play a star in soccer games!
Control Mario with just a tap!

editorialNotes.standard: He's here! We're all about pulling off stylish moves with a single tap, thanks to super-simple, one-touch controls. But collecting all the pink coins? That takes skill. With tons of unlocks (including Luigi!), youâll be playing this one long after you reach the final flagpole.

name: Tomb of the Mask: Pixel Maze

editorialNotes.standard: Speed is survival in this devilishly fast tomb-raiding arcade game. Like some glorious mix of Indiana Jones and Pac-Man, you race from room to room, nabbing all the coins you can while staying ahead of an ever-moving (and lethal) wall. With its crafty mazes, tricky traps, simple controls, and eye-popping retro minimalism, itâs an experience youâll happily lose yourself in.
Here comes the wave! In this gorgeous open-world RPG, explore eroded landscapes, battle otherworldly creatures and unlock incredible skills.

Daredevil. Storm. Juggernaut. Vision. Kabamâs beautiful brawler gives you control of dozens of beloved heroes and villains as you punch, kick and blast your way across the Marvel universe. A simple and intuitive set of attacks, counters and special attacks make for edge-of-your-seat combat, but youâll spend just as much time finding and upgrading your super-team. Figuring out the best way to use them is key to surviving bouts with relentless opponentsâand progressing through treacherous story quests.

editorialNotes.standard: Adventure across a modern cityscape filled with raids, dungeons, and lots of monsters in this gorgeous action RPG based on the popular webtoon.
With new mini-games and real-time multiplayer duels, this fruit-slashing sequel is a cut above.

It's back! Sprint for the leaderboards in the sequel to one of the App Store's most popular endless runners, which arrives with a host of fabulous improvements, from overhauled graphics to refined controls, original minecart and zip-line challenges, and much more.

Deathâs never been funnier. Funny enough that when we die while poking a bear or wiring house lights, weâre as happy as when we live. Win or lose, these clever, cartoonish mini-games make survival an irresistible challenge.
